settings.title: Tag Group Manager Settings
settings.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

commands.insertHere: Please click on the tag to insert

messages.duplicateTag: Tag already exists in this group
messages.noEditorFound: No editor found, please open a document first
messages.openMarkdownFirst: Please open a Markdown document and place the cursor at the insertion point
messages.tagGroupUpdated: Tag group updated, added {count} new tags
messages.tagGroupUpToDate: Tag group is up to date
messages.cycleButtonTooltip: Cyclic Mode: off - click to turn on cyclic mode to restore all tags and keep the number the same. shift+click to update the tag list from the tag group.
messages.cycleButtonTooltip1: Cyclic Mode: enabled - click to turn off cyclic mode.Shift+click to update the tag list from the tag group.
messages.cycleButtonTooltip2: Cyclic Mode: turned off - click to turn on Cyclic Mode to restore all tags.Shift+click to update the tag list from the tag group.
